title: mix of file-centric and app-centric
body:
(first off, this is not an easy problem to fix or something which is necessarily important, i just want to make everyone aware of it.)

at the moment, owncloud has this strange mix of file management and apps:
* files sync and sharing is at the core, all syncable
* calendar, contacts, bookmarks etc use the database to store their data
* music, pictures and notes though use the files app to store their data and hence show up there

the latter point seems confusing to people. while it’s good to have those files synced for free, apparently it’s strange to have data from one app show up in another.

another problem is that music and pictures themselves are inferior in functionality to files in that they do not have functionality to upload new data, create albums, and delete stuff cc @butonic @kabum.
